name: Korikakumon
effect: You may digivolve this card from your hand onto one of your blue Tamers as if the Tamer is a level 3 blue Digimon for a memory cost of 2. [When Digivolving] If a card with [Hybrid] in its traits or [Tommy Himi] is in this Digimon's digivolution cards, 1 of your opponent's Digimon with no digivolution cards can't attack or block until the end of their next turn.
